turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'm looking to place a coffee order from the Starbucks near me on South Broad Street in Philadelphia. Can you help me out?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let's do it. what did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a tall caffe mocha with almond milk topped with whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem. and did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, hot, please. Way too cold to get iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: too bad i'm not familiar with temperatures. i stay constantly warm. so anyway, you said tall hot cafe mocha with almond milk, topped with whipped cream from from starbucks on south broad street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the total is $4.50 should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've placed the order, it'll be ready for pick up in 10 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need my help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful. glad to help. take care.
